ISSUE.TITLE: Yaml command multiline regression
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION:
Hello, Multi line is not supported since version 1.1.0. In my yaml, i have this : ```yaml deploy: image: docker volumes: - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock commands: | docker run -d \ --name foo \ foo/foo ``` and in my drone build i had this `run -d \n -name foo \n foo/foo` But with the version 1.1.0, i have this `run -d 
 --name foo 
 foo/foo` `
` are not correctly escaped so i have this error: `Unable to find image 'n:latest' locally`. Tried to compare branches to see where is the mistake but i did not find. Could you fix it ? :) Thank you.
